summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of North and Northeast 130th St. from the Central Freeway in the vicinity of 3rd Ave. Northeast to Greenwood Ave. North (said street is being established by condemnation under authority of Ordinance No. 91887), by grading, by constructing concrete sidewalks and a multiple-lift surfaced roadway; by constructing storm drains; providing for the necessary surface drainage and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6295 and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
